body_html: Indeed, for this case it would be more appropriate to use tf.reduce_sum(). However, if you need to define a recurrent network, where the input to an op depends on its output in a previous iteration in some non-trivial way, then the support for iteration will be useful.
body_text: Indeed, for this case it would be more appropriate to use tf.reduce_sum(). However, if you need to define a recurrent network, where the input to an op depends on its output in a previous iteration in some non-trivial way, then the support for iteration will be useful.
body: Indeed, for this case it would be more appropriate to use `tf.reduce_sum()`. However, if you need to define a recurrent network, where the input to an op depends on its output in a previous iteration in some non-trivial way, then the support for iteration will be useful.
